text: Luis Algacir Vergílio da Silva (23 March 1973 - 23 January 2010) was a former Brazilian para table tennis player. His highest rank was world number six in January 2005 in sports category 3 and has won his table tennis titles with Welder Knaf. He died of cancer aged 36 in his hometown of Curitiba. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:2010 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Curitiba Category:Paralympic table tennis players of Brazil Category:Brazilian male table tennis players Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Table tennis players at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in table tennis Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Brazil
title: Luiz Algacir Silva
